data.name: SCP Strategy
data.detailed_description:
What SCP is?

SCP ("Secure, Contain, Protect") is a fictional secret organization created to protect the world from all kinds of weird and supernatural objects and anomalies. The main thing is the SCP wiki which has descriptions about the various anomalies they've found, test reports, and various events involving them. SCP is probably the largest cooperative writing project on the web. http://www.scpwiki.com/


Report of July 26, 1962

Currently, all over the world, there are phenomena, places, objects that should not be found in normal life. The main goal of the Foundation is the protection of these objects and their activities from the rest of humanity so that they can lead a peaceful life.

From then on, you take command of the whole Foundation and your task is to find and retrieve any information useful to the Foundation. Now, Foundation is completely in your control.

You will manage the funds, SCP objects, personnel. Each SCP object is assigned a class defining the threat it poses to its existence. Methods of transporting the objects are clearly defined by the documentation of the objects.

While taking care of contained objects, you will also have to watch out for foreign organizations and their activities, and liquidate them if necessary.

We cannot allow exposing SCP subjects to the light of the day.

We secure. We contain. We protect.
- The Administrator

About the Game

SCP Strategy


Take on the role of the legendary Administrator and start your own foundation protecting people from unknown objects. Every day there is information about new anomalies. Create special forces and send them to dangerous parts of the world to contain these anomalies.



Cooperate with governments around the world, acquire new technologies, increase your influence.

Once you get to the most interesting objects, start a series of research and tests to learn as much as possible about them. However, be sure to exercise caution as the slightest mistake can be catastrophic.

Features

  • Organization management
  • Searching for objects
  • Conducting research on objects
  • Defense of the organization
  • Objects editor

data.short_description: Take control of the SCP Foundation. For the general good, find, contain, and protect SCP objects. Develop your foundation and protect it from hostile organizations, in the last resort destroy them and capture SCP objects held there.

*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32 bit
  • Processor: 2 cores 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 430 or Radeon 6450
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
